create.title: Create New Event
create.subtitle: Fill in the details to create a new Roundup Games event. You can save as draft and publish later.

placeholders.name: Awesome Summer Tournament
placeholders.short_description: Brief description for event cards and previews
placeholders.etransfer_instructions: Include the security question, expected password, or any other notes for e-transfer payments.
placeholders.short_description_card: One-line summary for cards and previews
placeholders.description_details: Share key details, schedule, and what to expect

descriptions.slug: This will be used in the event URL
descriptions.logo: Displayed on compact cards and featured sections.
descriptions.banner: Shown on the public event page and featured listings.
descriptions.logo_helper: Ideal size is a square PNG or JPG up to 5MB.
descriptions.banner_helper: Use a wide image (16:9) up to 8MB for the event hero.
descriptions.etransfer_recipient: Where e-transfer payments should be sent
descriptions.public_event_admin: Make this event visible to everyone
descriptions.featured_event: Highlight this event on the homepage and in search results
descriptions.allow_waitlist: Allow registrations to join a waitlist when the event is full
descriptions.require_membership: Only allow users with active Roundup Games memberships to register

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Add visuals to personalize your event. Upload images or paste URLs for assets you already host.

admin_approval.title: Admin Approval Required
admin_approval.description: Your event will be created as a draft and will require admin approval before it becomes publicly visible. You can still manage and edit your event while it's pending approval.

approval_process.description: After creating your event, an administrator will review it and approve it for public visibility. You'll be notified once your event is approved.

validation.slug_format: Slug must be lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only
validation.short_description_max: Short description must be under 500 characters
validation.etransfer_recipient_required: E-transfer recipient email is required when e-transfer is enabled
validation.early_bird_deadline_required: Early bird deadline is required when a discount is provided
validation.early_bird_discount_required: Set a discount percentage or remove the deadline

upload.wait_for_upload: Please wait for image uploads to complete before submitting.

success.created_pending_approval: Event created! It will be reviewed by an admin before becoming public.

errors.creation_error: An error occurred while creating the event

list.empty_state: No events found matching your criteria.

minimal_form.title: Create New Event (Test)
minimal_form.description: This is a minimal test form to isolate the rendering issue.

registration.event_not_available: The event you're trying to register for doesn't exist or is not publicly available.
registration.already_registered_description: You are already registered for this event.
registration.register_description: Complete the form below to register for this event
registration.need_team_to_register: You need to be part of a team to register as a team.
registration.additional_info_placeholder: Any dietary restrictions, accessibility needs, or other information...
registration.pay_securely_online: Pay securely online with credit or debit card.
registration.submit_send_payment_manually: Submit now and send payment manually after this form.
registration.send_payment_to: Send payment to {{recipient}}. Include your name and the event in the message.
registration.no_payment_description: This registration does not require payment. Submit the form to finish.
registration.agree_terms: I agree to the event terms and code of conduct
registration.agree_terms_description: You must agree to these terms to participate in the event.
registration.accept_liability_waiver: I have read and accepted the liability waiver
registration.accept_waiver_description: Every participant must accept the waiver before registering.
registration.send_payment_finalize: Send your payment to finalize the registration.
registration.payment_received_confirmation: Once the payment is received, an administrator will mark your registration as paid.
registration.registration_submitted: Registration submitted! Follow the e-transfer instructions below.
registration.accept_all_terms: Please accept all terms and conditions

not_found.title: Event Not Found
not_found.description: The event you're looking for doesn't exist or is not publicly available.

listing.title: Events
listing.subtitle: Tournaments, training camps, and community festivals
listing.description: Roundup Games sanctions competitions year-round so athletes at every level can compete, learn, and connect.
listing.no_results: No events match this filter right now. Contact us at {{email}} and we'll add your event to the calendar.
